The controller for the Connect Four game

countDiagonalLeft(int, int, PlayerColor) - Method in class connectFour.Board
Counts all the diagonal fields from right up to left down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
countDiagonalRight(int, int, PlayerColor) - Method in class connectFour.Board
Counts all the diagonal fields from left up to right down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
countHorizontal(int, int, PlayerColor) - Method in class connectFour.Board
Counts all the horizontal fields up and down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
countVertical(int, int, PlayerColor) - Method in class connectFour.Board
Counts all the vertical fields left and right from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
